name: Press Enter to Begin 2
description:
It's another boring day at work...For most people that is. You are unlucky enough to work at the mysterious video game studio D.U.Z.E where three employees have mysteriously gone missing and it's your job to go into the studio's secret basement  to find out what happened.

NOTE: This is an actual demo for the sequel to Press Enter to Begin so this game is currently very short and unfinished. ;)
